apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the dark skin tone woman in a manual wheelchair is rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting, giving her a dignified and empowered appearance. Her posture is upright and forward-facing, conveying a sense of determination and active participation, emphasized by the detailed design of the wheelchair's spokes and frame. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, celebrates inclusivity and represents individuals navigating the world with independence and strength.
